Projects

Here are some of the key projects I've developed. Each demonstrates different aspects of my technical skills and problem-solving abilities.

CodeGrind

React Node.js Python PostgreSQL Prisma Microsoft Azure

Gamified technical interview preparation platform with AI tutoring assistant. CodeGrind provides guidance without explicit answers and features community-contributed problem sets.

Live Site Demo Link (Coming Soon)
Detailed screenshots and more information coming soon!

Helios (Capstone Project)

ASP.NET Python C# Unity

Swarm Robotics platform for disaster scenario simulations. Features include frameless PyQt5 GUI, Unity scenarios, PDF export with visualizations, and ROS 2 integration.

Base Repo Release Repo
Detailed screenshots and more information coming soon!

BestNotes

Python Qt Core Pyside6

Free, open-source note-taking application with moveable toolbar and customizable eraser features.

More details coming soon!

Projectile Launcher Rework

Lua YAML JSON RedScript

Mod for Cyberpunk 2077 with 45k+ downloads. Modified game mechanics with new variants, attachments, and ammo.
